nodes.bodyText: Is the display name correct for the test? I see no reference to RTEs in the test body.
Yes that's a typo thanks, corrected it

Any new files you create (this one, RFileReaderIteratorTest.java and AccumuloTabletTest.java should have just the current year in the copyright. For example
